Davenport.Modern Woodmen Park: Modern Woodmen Park (known previously as John O'Donnell Stadium and Municipal Stadium), is a minor league baseball venue located in Davenport, Iowa, United States. It is home to the Quad Cities River Bandits, a Class-A affiliate of the Houston Astros. Located on the banks of the Mississippi River, in the shadow of the Centennial Bridge, home run balls to right field often land in the river.
